ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: That s one of my characters. I have a cleric, a wizard, a druid, and a bard. luv, -Su ... had ... weighted ... I m ... not ...
ygData.messageBody:
That's one of my characters. I have a cleric, a wizard, a druid, and a bard.
luv,
-Su

> Dear Su, you are a druid right?
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Su [SMTP:suceress@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2001 8:13 AM
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets
> >
> >
> > Yeah. I think only player character are effected by the delay. Bc I've
had
> > orcs swing 4 times in the time I could swing once and my delay was half
> > the
> > delay ont he weapons they were holding.
> > The EQ people sure did a good job in wieghing things in the favor of the
> > npcs.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > That reminds me....I've heard that pet's have a static delay time when
> > > swinging...
> > >
> > > If this is true...then wouldn't it be great to hand your pet a
weighted
> > axe?
> > > 50 dam 150 delay ( i think these are the stats )
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Nygaardr, FC3 [SMTP:nygaardr@...]
> > > > Sent: Friday, April 13, 2001 5:44 AM
> > > > To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> > > > Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
> > > >
> > > > Yeah, I said they made good pet weapons. Never said a player of any
> > lvl
> > > > should use them.
> > > >
> > > > Mu
> > > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
> > > > Sent: Friday, April 13, 2001 2:44 AM
> > > > To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> > > > Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Just stating I'd rather that my weapon/armor knocked em dead on the
> > battle
> > > > field then in a fashion show :> (sorry my TRY at wit)
> > > >
> > > > >On a side note the Kobolds near the king, maybe other places too
I'm
> > not
> > > > > sure, drop some of THE BEST looking weapons in the game. Stats
not
> > too
> > > > > good about like FS but the looks are great.
